stench.name: Stench
stench.desc:
By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokemon
may cause the target to flinch.
stench.shortDesc:
By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokemon
may cause the target to flinch.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.desc: The Pokemon makes it rain when it enters a battle.
drizzle.shortDesc: The Pokemon makes it rain when it enters a battle.

speedboost.name: Speed Boost
speedboost.desc: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.
speedboost.shortDesc: Its Speed stat is boosted every turn.

battlearmor.name: Battle Armor
battlearmor.desc: Hard armor protects the Pokemon from critical hits.
battlearmor.shortDesc: Hard armor protects the Pokemon from critical hits.

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.desc:
It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO
moves cannot knock it out, either.
sturdy.shortDesc:
It cannot be knocked out with one hit. One-hit KO
moves cannot knock it out, either.

damp.name: Damp
damp.desc:
Prevents the use of explosive moves such as
Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.
damp.shortDesc:
Prevents the use of explosive moves such as
Self-Destruct by dampening its surroundings.

limber.name: Limber
limber.desc: Its limber body protects the Pokemon from paralysis.
limber.shortDesc: Its limber body protects the Pokemon from paralysis.

sandveil.name: Sand Veil
sandveil.desc: Boosts the Pokemon’s evasion in a sandstorm.
sandveil.shortDesc: Boosts the Pokemon’s evasion in a sandstorm.

static.name: Static
static.desc:
The Pokemon is charged with static electricity, so
contact with it may cause paralysis.
static.shortDesc:
The Pokemon is charged with static electricity, so
contact with it may cause paralysis.

voltabsorb.name: Volt Absorb
voltabsorb.desc:
Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead
of taking damage.
voltabsorb.shortDesc:
Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead
of taking damage.

waterabsorb.name: Water Absorb
waterabsorb.desc:
Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move, instead of
taking damage.
waterabsorb.shortDesc:
Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move, instead of
taking damage.

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.desc:
The Pokemon is oblivious, and that keeps it from
being infatuated or falling for taunts.
oblivious.shortDesc:
The Pokemon is oblivious, and that keeps it from
being infatuated or falling for taunts.

sixthsense.name: Sixth Sense
sixthsense.desc: This Pokemon’s accuracy is boosted by 30%.
sixthsense.shortDesc: This Pokemon’s accuracy is boosted by 30%.

insomnia.name: Insomnia
insomnia.desc:
The Pokemon is suffering from insomnia and cannot
fall asleep.
insomnia.shortDesc:
The Pokemon is suffering from insomnia and cannot
fall asleep.

colorchange.name: Color Change
colorchange.desc:
The Pokemon’s type becomes the type of the move
used on it.
colorchange.shortDesc:
The Pokemon’s type becomes the type of the move
used on it.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.desc:
The immune system of the Pokemon prevents it from
getting poisoned.
immunity.shortDesc:
The immune system of the Pokemon prevents it from
getting poisoned.

flashfire.name: Flash Fire
flashfire.desc:
Powers up the Pokemon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit
by one.
flashfire.shortDesc:
Powers up the Pokemon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit
by one.

shielddust.name: Shield Dust
shielddust.desc:
This Pokemon’s dust blocks the additional effects of
attacks taken.
shielddust.shortDesc:
This Pokemon’s dust blocks the additional effects of
attacks taken.

owntempo.name: Own Tempo
owntempo.desc:
This Pokemon has its own tempo, and that prevents
it from becoming confused.
owntempo.shortDesc:
This Pokemon has its own tempo, and that prevents
it from becoming confused.

suctioncups.name: Suction Cups
suctioncups.desc:
This Pokemon uses suction cups to stay in one spot
to negate all moves and items that force
switching out.
suctioncups.shortDesc:
This Pokemon uses suction cups to stay in one spot
to negate all moves and items that force
switching out.

intimidate.name: Intimidate
intimidate.desc:
The Pokemon intimidates opposing Pokemon upon
entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.
intimidate.shortDesc:
The Pokemon intimidates opposing Pokemon upon
entering battle, lowering their Attack stat.

shadowtag.name: Shadow Tag
shadowtag.desc:
This Pokemon steps on the opposing Pokemon’s
shadow to prevent it from escaping.
shadowtag.shortDesc:
This Pokemon steps on the opposing Pokemon’s
shadow to prevent it from escaping.

roughskin.name: Rough Skin
roughskin.desc:
This Pokemon inflicts damage with its rough skin
to the attacker on contact.
roughskin.shortDesc:
This Pokemon inflicts damage with its rough skin
to the attacker on contact.

wonderguard.name: Wonder Guard
wonderguard.desc:
Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves
hit the Pokemon.
wonderguard.shortDesc:
Its mysterious power only lets supereffective moves
hit the Pokemon.

levitate.name: Levitate
levitate.desc:
By floating in the air, the Pokemon receives full
immunity to all Ground-type moves.
levitate.shortDesc:
By floating in the air, the Pokemon receives full
immunity to all Ground-type moves.

effectspore.name: Effect Spore
effectspore.desc:
Contact with the Pokemon may inflict poison, sleep,
or paralysis on its attacker.
effectspore.shortDesc:
Contact with the Pokemon may inflict poison, sleep,
or paralysis on its attacker.

synchronize.name: Synchronize
synchronize.desc:
The attacker will receive the same status condition if
it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokemon.
synchronize.shortDesc:
The attacker will receive the same status condition if
it inflicts a burn, poison, or paralysis to the Pokemon.

clearbody.name: Clear Body
clearbody.desc:
Prevents other Pokemon’s moves or Abilities from
lowering the Pokemon’s stats.
clearbody.shortDesc:
Prevents other Pokemon’s moves or Abilities from
lowering the Pokemon’s stats.

naturalcure.name: Natural Cure
naturalcure.desc:
All status conditions heal when the Pokemon
switches out.
naturalcure.shortDesc:
All status conditions heal when the Pokemon
switches out.

lightningrod.name: Lightning Rod
lightningrod.desc:
The Pokemon draws in all Electric-type moves. 
Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves, 
it boosts its Sp. Atk.
lightningrod.shortDesc:
The Pokemon draws in all Electric-type moves. 
Instead of being hit by Electric-type moves, 
it boosts its Sp. Atk.

serenegrace.name: Serene Grace
serenegrace.desc:
Doubles the likelihood of additional effects occurring 
when attacking.
serenegrace.shortDesc:
Doubles the likelihood of additional effects occurring 
when attacking.

swiftswim.name: Swift Swim
swiftswim.desc: Doubles the Pokemon’s Speed stat in rain.
swiftswim.shortDesc: Doubles the Pokemon’s Speed stat in rain.

solarrush.name: Solar Rush
solarrush.desc: Doubles the Pokemon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
solarrush.shortDesc: Doubles the Pokemon’s Speed stat in harsh sunlight.

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.desc:
Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokemon by
illuminating the surroundings.
illuminate.shortDesc:
Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokemon by
illuminating the surroundings.

trace.name: Trace
trace.desc:
When it enters a battle, the Pokemon copies an
opposing Pokemon’s Ability.
trace.shortDesc:
When it enters a battle, the Pokemon copies an
opposing Pokemon’s Ability.

poisonpoint.name: Poison Point
poisonpoint.desc: Contact with the Pokemon may poison the attacker.
poisonpoint.shortDesc: Contact with the Pokemon may poison the attacker.

innerfocus.name: Inner Focus
innerfocus.desc:
The Pokemon’s intensely focused, and that protects
the Pokemon from flinching.
innerfocus.shortDesc:
The Pokemon’s intensely focused, and that protects
the Pokemon from flinching.

magmaarmor.name: Magma Armor
magmaarmor.desc:
The Pokemon is covered with hot magma, which
prevents the Pokemon from becoming frozen.
magmaarmor.shortDesc:
The Pokemon is covered with hot magma, which
prevents the Pokemon from becoming frozen.

waterveil.name: Water Veil
waterveil.desc:
The Pokemon is covered with a water veil, which
prevents the Pokemon from getting a burn.
waterveil.shortDesc:
The Pokemon is covered with a water veil, which
prevents the Pokemon from getting a burn.

magnetpull.name: Magnet Pull
magnetpull.desc:
Prevents Steel-type Pokemon from escaping using
its magnetic force.
magnetpull.shortDesc:
Prevents Steel-type Pokemon from escaping using
its magnetic force.

sinister.name: Sinister
sinister.desc:
This Pokemon is immune to Fairy-type moves.
This does not protect against Pixilate.
sinister.shortDesc:
This Pokemon is immune to Fairy-type moves.
This does not protect against Pixilate.

raindish.name: Rain Dish
raindish.desc: The Pokemon gradually regains HP in rain.
raindish.shortDesc: The Pokemon gradually regains HP in rain.

sandstream.name: Sand Stream
sandstream.desc:
The Pokemon summons a sandstorm when it enters
a battle.
sandstream.shortDesc:
The Pokemon summons a sandstorm when it enters
a battle.

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.desc:
By putting pressure on the opposing Pokemon, it
raises their PP usage.
pressure.shortDesc:
By putting pressure on the opposing Pokemon, it
raises their PP usage.

thickfat.name: Thick Fat
thickfat.desc:
The Pokemon is protected by a layer of thick fat,
which halves the damage taken from Fire- and
Ice-type moves.
thickfat.shortDesc:
The Pokemon is protected by a layer of thick fat,
which halves the damage taken from Fire- and
Ice-type moves.

earlybird.name: Early Bird
earlybird.desc:
The Pokemon awakens twice as fast as other
Pokemon from sleep.
earlybird.shortDesc:
The Pokemon awakens twice as fast as other
Pokemon from sleep.

flamebody.name: Flame Body
flamebody.desc: Contact with the Pokemon may burn the attacker.
flamebody.shortDesc: Contact with the Pokemon may burn the attacker.

runaway.name: Run Away
runaway.desc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokemon.
runaway.shortDesc: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokemon.

keeneye.name: Keen Eye
keeneye.desc:
Keen eyes prevent other Pokemon from lowering this
Pokemon’s accuracy.
keeneye.shortDesc:
Keen eyes prevent other Pokemon from lowering this
Pokemon’s accuracy.

hypercutter.name: Hyper Cutter
hypercutter.desc:
The Pokemon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They
prevent other Pokemon from lowering its Attack stat.
hypercutter.shortDesc:
The Pokemon’s proud of its powerful pincers. They
prevent other Pokemon from lowering its Attack stat.

database.name: Database
database.desc:
Picks up important items to evolve itself, as well as
Memories and Drives. Go to the Google Sheets for
exact percentages and items, and more.
database.shortDesc:
Picks up important items to evolve itself, as well as
Memories and Drives. Go to the Google Sheets for
exact percentages and items, and more.

truant.name: Truant
truant.desc:
The Pokemon can’t use a move the following turn if it
uses one.
truant.shortDesc:
The Pokemon can’t use a move the following turn if it
uses one.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.desc:
Greatly boosts the Attack stat by 50% for a 20%
accuracy drop on most Physical moves.
hustle.shortDesc:
Greatly boosts the Attack stat by 50% for a 20%
accuracy drop on most Physical moves.

cutecharm.name: Cute Charm
cutecharm.desc: Contact with the Pokemon may cause infatuation.
cutecharm.shortDesc: Contact with the Pokemon may cause infatuation.

interstellar.name: Interstellar
interstellar.desc:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokemon if an ally
with the same ability is also in battle.
interstellar.shortDesc:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokemon if an ally
with the same ability is also in battle.

evoboost.name: Evoboost
evoboost.desc:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokemon if an ally
with the same ability is also in battle.
evoboost.shortDesc:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat of the Pokemon if an ally
with the same ability is also in battle.

forecast.name: Forecast
forecast.desc:
The Pokemon transforms with the weather to change
its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.
forecast.shortDesc:
The Pokemon transforms with the weather to change
its type to Water, Fire, or Ice.

stickyhold.name: Sticky Hold
stickyhold.desc:
Items held by the Pokemon are stuck fast and
cannot be removed by other Pokemon.
stickyhold.shortDesc:
Items held by the Pokemon are stuck fast and
cannot be removed by other Pokemon.

shedskin.name: Shed Skin
shedskin.desc:
The Pokemon may heal its own status conditions
by shedding its skin.
shedskin.shortDesc:
The Pokemon may heal its own status conditions
by shedding its skin.

guts.name: Guts
guts.desc:
It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts
the Pokemon’s Attack stat.
guts.shortDesc:
It’s so gutsy that having a status condition boosts
the Pokemon’s Attack stat.

marvelscale.name: Marvel Scale
marvelscale.desc:
The Pokemon’s marvelous scales boost the Defense
stat if it has a status condition.
marvelscale.shortDesc:
The Pokemon’s marvelous scales boost the Defense
stat if it has a status condition.

liquidooze.name: Liquid Ooze
liquidooze.desc:
Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages
attackers using any draining move.
liquidooze.shortDesc:
Oozed liquid has strong stench, which damages
attackers using any draining move.

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.desc:
Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokemon’s
HP is low.
overgrow.shortDesc:
Powers up Grass-type moves when the Pokemon’s
HP is low.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.desc:
Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokemon’s HP
is low.
blaze.shortDesc:
Powers up Fire-type moves when the Pokemon’s HP
is low.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.desc:
Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokemon’s
HP is low.
torrent.shortDesc:
Powers up Water-type moves when the Pokemon’s
HP is low.

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.desc:
Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokemon’s HP
is low.
swarm.shortDesc:
Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokemon’s HP
is low.

headstrong.name: Headstrong
headstrong.desc: Protects the Pokemon from recoil damage.
headstrong.shortDesc: Protects the Pokemon from recoil damage.

drought.name: Drought
drought.desc:
Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokemon enters
a battle.
drought.shortDesc:
Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokemon enters
a battle.

vitalspirit.name: Vital Spirit
vitalspirit.desc:
The Pokemon is full of vitality, and that prevents
it from falling asleep.
vitalspirit.shortDesc:
The Pokemon is full of vitality, and that prevents
it from falling asleep.

determination.name: Determination
determination.desc:
The Pokemon is highly determined, which
prevents other Pokemon from lowering its stats.
determination.shortDesc:
The Pokemon is highly determined, which
prevents other Pokemon from lowering its stats.

purepower.name: Pure Power
purepower.desc:
Using its pure power, the Pokemon doubles its
Attack stat.
purepower.shortDesc:
Using its pure power, the Pokemon doubles its
Attack stat.

shellarmor.name: Shell Armor
shellarmor.desc: A hard shell protects the Pokemon from critical hits.
shellarmor.shortDesc: A hard shell protects the Pokemon from critical hits.

tangledfeet.name: Tangled Feet
tangledfeet.desc: Raises evasion if the Pokemon is confused.
tangledfeet.shortDesc: Raises evasion if the Pokemon is confused.

motordrive.name: Motor Drive
motordrive.desc:
Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move,
instead of taking damage.
motordrive.shortDesc:
Boosts its Speed stat if hit by an Electric-type move,
instead of taking damage.

rivalry.name: Rivalry
rivalry.desc:
Becomes competitive and deals more damage to
Pokemon of the same gender, but deals less to
Pokemon of the opposite gender.
rivalry.shortDesc:
Becomes competitive and deals more damage to
Pokemon of the same gender, but deals less to
Pokemon of the opposite gender.

steadfast.name: Steadfast
steadfast.desc:
The Pokemon’s determination boosts the Speed
stat each time the Pokemon flinches.
steadfast.shortDesc:
The Pokemon’s determination boosts the Speed
stat each time the Pokemon flinches.

gluttony.name: Gluttony
gluttony.desc:
Makes the Pokemon eat a held Berry when its HP
drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.
gluttony.shortDesc:
Makes the Pokemon eat a held Berry when its HP
drops to half or less, which is sooner than usual.

angerpoint.name: Anger Point
angerpoint.desc:
The Pokemon is angered when it takes a critical hit,
and that maxes its Attack stat.
angerpoint.shortDesc:
The Pokemon is angered when it takes a critical hit,
and that maxes its Attack stat.

unburden.name: Unburden
unburden.desc:
Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokemon’s held item is 
used or lost.
unburden.shortDesc:
Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokemon’s held item is 
used or lost.

heatproof.name: Heatproof
heatproof.desc:
The heatproof body of the Pokemon halves the
damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.
heatproof.shortDesc:
The heatproof body of the Pokemon halves the
damage from Fire-type moves that hit it.

simple.name: Simple
simple.desc: The stat changes the Pokemon receives are doubled.
simple.shortDesc: The stat changes the Pokemon receives are doubled.

dryskin.name: Dry Skin
dryskin.desc:
Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type
moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases
the damage received from Fire-type moves.
dryskin.shortDesc:
Restores HP in rain or when hit by Water-type
moves. Reduces HP in harsh sunlight, and increases
the damage received from Fire-type moves.

instinct.name: Instinct
instinct.desc:
Compares an opposing Pokemon’s Defense and
Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or
Sp. Atk stat by 1.5x.
instinct.shortDesc:
Compares an opposing Pokemon’s Defense and
Sp. Def stats before raising its own Attack or
Sp. Atk stat by 1.5x.

amplifier.name: Amplifier
amplifier.desc:
Boosts the power of Sound-based moves by 20%.
Find a detailed list on the Google Sheet.
amplifier.shortDesc:
Boosts the power of Sound-based moves by 20%.
Find a detailed list on the Google Sheet.

poisonheal.name: Poison Heal
poisonheal.desc:
Restores HP if the Pokemon is poisoned, instead of
losing HP.
poisonheal.shortDesc:
Restores HP if the Pokemon is poisoned, instead of
losing HP.

adaptability.name: Adaptability
adaptability.desc:
Moves that are the same type as the user
deal 2x damage instead of 1.5x.
adaptability.shortDesc:
Moves that are the same type as the user
deal 2x damage instead of 1.5x.

skilllink.name: Skill Link
skilllink.desc:
Maximizes the number of times multi-strike
moves hit.
skilllink.shortDesc:
Maximizes the number of times multi-strike
moves hit.

hydration.name: Hydration
hydration.desc: Heals status conditions if it’s raining.
hydration.shortDesc: Heals status conditions if it’s raining.

solarpower.name: Solar Power
solarpower.desc:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP
decreases every turn.
solarpower.shortDesc:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat in harsh sunlight, but HP
decreases every turn.

quickfeet.name: Quick Feet
quickfeet.desc:
Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokemon has a
status condition.
quickfeet.shortDesc:
Boosts the Speed stat if the Pokemon has a
status condition.

normalize.name: Normalize
normalize.desc:
All the Pokemon’s moves become Normal type.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.
normalize.shortDesc:
All the Pokemon’s moves become Normal type.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.

ruthless.name: Ruthless
ruthless.desc:
Powers up moves if they become critical hits
to 2.25x damage instead of 1.5x.
ruthless.shortDesc:
Powers up moves if they become critical hits
to 2.25x damage instead of 1.5x.

magicguard.name: Magic Guard
magicguard.desc: The Pokemon only takes damage from attacks.
magicguard.shortDesc: The Pokemon only takes damage from attacks.

noguard.name: No Guard
noguard.desc:
The Pokemon employs no-guard tactics to ensure
incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
noguard.shortDesc:
The Pokemon employs no-guard tactics to ensure
incoming and outgoing attacks always land.

stagnantstate.name: Stagnant State
stagnantstate.desc: The Pokemon moves after all other Pokemon do.
stagnantstate.shortDesc: The Pokemon moves after all other Pokemon do.

technician.name: Technician
technician.desc:
Powers up the Pokemon’s moves by 1.5x if they
are 60 Base Power or less.
technician.shortDesc:
Powers up the Pokemon’s moves by 1.5x if they
are 60 Base Power or less.

leafguard.name: Leaf Guard
leafguard.desc: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.
leafguard.shortDesc: Prevents status conditions in harsh sunlight.

klutz.name: Klutz
klutz.desc: The Pokemon can’t use any held items.
klutz.shortDesc: The Pokemon can’t use any held items.

moldbreaker.name: Mold Breaker
moldbreaker.desc:
Moves can be used on the target regardless of
its Abilities.
moldbreaker.shortDesc:
Moves can be used on the target regardless of
its Abilities.

superluck.name: Super Luck
superluck.desc:
The Pokemon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios
of its moves are boosted.
superluck.shortDesc:
The Pokemon is so lucky that the critical-hit ratios
of its moves are boosted.

oldaftermath.name: Old Aftermath
oldaftermath.desc:
Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokemon
with a finishing hit.
oldaftermath.shortDesc:
Damages the attacker if it contacts the Pokemon
with a finishing hit.

anticipation.name: Anticipation
anticipation.desc:
The Pokemon can sense an opposing Pokemon’s
dangerous moves.
anticipation.shortDesc:
The Pokemon can sense an opposing Pokemon’s
dangerous moves.

forewarn.name: Forewarn
forewarn.desc:
When it enters a battle, the Pokemon can tell one of
the moves an opposing Pokemon has.
forewarn.shortDesc:
When it enters a battle, the Pokemon can tell one of
the moves an opposing Pokemon has.

unaware.name: Unaware
unaware.desc:
When attacking, the Pokemon ignores the target
Pokemon’s stat changes.
unaware.shortDesc:
When attacking, the Pokemon ignores the target
Pokemon’s stat changes.

tintedlens.name: Tinted Lens
tintedlens.desc:
The Pokemon can use “not very effective” moves
to deal regular damage.
tintedlens.shortDesc:
The Pokemon can use “not very effective” moves
to deal regular damage.

filter.name: Filter
filter.desc:
Reduces the power of supereffective attacks
taken by 25%.
filter.shortDesc:
Reduces the power of supereffective attacks
taken by 25%.

slowstart.name: Slow Start
slowstart.desc:
For five turns, the Pokemon’s Attack and Speed
stats are halved.
slowstart.shortDesc:
For five turns, the Pokemon’s Attack and Speed
stats are halved.

scrappy.name: Scrappy
scrappy.desc:
The Pokemon can hit Ghost-type Pokemon with
Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
scrappy.shortDesc:
The Pokemon can hit Ghost-type Pokemon with
Normal- and Fighting-type moves.

stormdrain.name: Storm Drain
stormdrain.desc:
Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit 
by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.
stormdrain.shortDesc:
Draws in all Water-type moves. Instead of being hit 
by Water-type moves, it boosts its Sp. Atk.

icebody.name: Ice Body
icebody.desc: The Pokemon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
icebody.shortDesc: The Pokemon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.

solidrock.name: Solid Rock
solidrock.desc: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
solidrock.shortDesc: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.

snowwarning.name: Snow Warning
snowwarning.desc:
The Pokemon summons a hailstorm when it enters
a battle.
snowwarning.shortDesc:
The Pokemon summons a hailstorm when it enters
a battle.

honeygather.name: Honey Gather
honeygather.desc: The Pokemon may gather Honey after a battle.
honeygather.shortDesc: The Pokemon may gather Honey after a battle.

frisk.name: Frisk
frisk.desc:
When it enters a battle, the Pokemon can check an
opposing Pokemon’s held item.
frisk.shortDesc:
When it enters a battle, the Pokemon can check an
opposing Pokemon’s held item.

reckless.name: Reckless
reckless.desc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
reckless.shortDesc: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.

multitype.name: Multitype
multitype.desc:
Changes the Pokemon’s type to match the Plate or
Z-Crystal it holds.
multitype.shortDesc:
Changes the Pokemon’s type to match the Plate or
Z-Crystal it holds.

flowergift.name: Flower Gift
flowergift.desc:
Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself
and allies in harsh sunlight by 1.5x.
flowergift.shortDesc:
Boosts the Attack and Sp. Def stats of itself
and allies in harsh sunlight by 1.5x.

baddreams.name: Bad Dreams
baddreams.desc: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokemon.
baddreams.shortDesc: Reduces the HP of sleeping opposing Pokemon.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.desc:
Steals an item from an attacker that made
direct contact.
pickpocket.shortDesc:
Steals an item from an attacker that made
direct contact.

sheerforce.name: Sheer Force
sheerforce.desc:
Removes additional effects to increase the power
of moves when attacking.
sheerforce.shortDesc:
Removes additional effects to increase the power
of moves when attacking.

contrary.name: Contrary
contrary.desc: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
contrary.shortDesc: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.

unnerve.name: Unnerve
unnerve.desc:
Unnerves opposing Pokemon and makes them unable
to eat Berries.
unnerve.shortDesc:
Unnerves opposing Pokemon and makes them unable
to eat Berries.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.desc:
Boosts the Pokemon’s Attack stat sharply when its
stats are lowered.
defiant.shortDesc:
Boosts the Pokemon’s Attack stat sharply when its
stats are lowered.

defeatist.name: Defeatist
defeatist.desc:
Halves the Pokemon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats
when its HP becomes half or less.
defeatist.shortDesc:
Halves the Pokemon’s Attack and Sp. Atk stats
when its HP becomes half or less.

cursedbody.name: Cursed Body
cursedbody.desc: May disable a move used on the Pokemon.
cursedbody.shortDesc: May disable a move used on the Pokemon.

healer.name: Healer
healer.desc: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.
healer.shortDesc: Sometimes heals an ally’s status condition.

weakarmor.name: Weak Armor
weakarmor.desc:
Physical attacks to the Pokemon lower its Defense
stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
weakarmor.shortDesc:
Physical attacks to the Pokemon lower its Defense
stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.

multiscale.name: Multiscale
multiscale.desc:
Reduces the amount of damage the Pokemon takes
when its HP is full.
multiscale.shortDesc:
Reduces the amount of damage the Pokemon takes
when its HP is full.

toxicboost.name: Toxic Boost
toxicboost.desc:
Powers up physical attacks when the Pokemon
is poisoned.
toxicboost.shortDesc:
Powers up physical attacks when the Pokemon
is poisoned.

flareboost.name: Flare Boost
flareboost.desc:
Powers up special attacks when the Pokemon
is burned.
flareboost.shortDesc:
Powers up special attacks when the Pokemon
is burned.

harvest.name: Harvest
harvest.desc: May create another Berry after one is used.
harvest.shortDesc: May create another Berry after one is used.

telepathy.name: Telepathy
telepathy.desc: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
telepathy.shortDesc: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.

moody.name: Moody
moody.desc:
Raises one stat sharply and lowers another
every turn.
moody.shortDesc:
Raises one stat sharply and lowers another
every turn.

overcoat.name: Overcoat
overcoat.desc:
Protects the Pokemon from things like sand, hail,
and powder.
overcoat.shortDesc:
Protects the Pokemon from things like sand, hail,
and powder.

poisontouch.name: Poison Touch
poisontouch.desc:
May poison a target when the Pokemon
makes contact.
poisontouch.shortDesc:
May poison a target when the Pokemon
makes contact.

regenerator.name: Regenerator
regenerator.desc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
regenerator.shortDesc: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.

bigpecks.name: Big Pecks
bigpecks.desc:
Protects the Pokemon from
Defense-lowering effects.
bigpecks.shortDesc:
Protects the Pokemon from
Defense-lowering effects.

sandrush.name: Sand Rush
sandrush.desc: Boosts the Pokemon’s Speed stat in a sandstorm.
sandrush.shortDesc: Boosts the Pokemon’s Speed stat in a sandstorm.

wonderskin.name: Wonder Skin
wonderskin.desc: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
wonderskin.shortDesc: Makes status moves more likely to miss.

analytic.name: Analytic
analytic.desc: Boosts move power by 30% when the Pokemon moves last.
analytic.shortDesc: Boosts move power by 30% when the Pokemon moves last.

illusion.name: Illusion
illusion.desc:
Comes out disguised as the Pokemon in the party’s
last spot.
illusion.shortDesc:
Comes out disguised as the Pokemon in the party’s
last spot.

imposter.name: Imposter
imposter.desc:
The Pokemon transforms itself into the Pokemon
it’s facing.
imposter.shortDesc:
The Pokemon transforms itself into the Pokemon
it’s facing.

infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
infiltrator.desc:
Passes through the opposing Pokemon’s barrier,
substitute, and the like and strikes.
infiltrator.shortDesc:
Passes through the opposing Pokemon’s barrier,
substitute, and the like and strikes.

gastroacid.name: Gastro Acid
gastroacid.desc:
Contact with the Pokemon changes the attacker’s
Ability to Gastro Acid.
gastroacid.shortDesc:
Contact with the Pokemon changes the attacker’s
Ability to Gastro Acid.

moxie.name: Moxie
moxie.desc:
The Pokemon shows moxie, and that boosts the
Attack stat after knocking out any Pokemon.
moxie.shortDesc:
The Pokemon shows moxie, and that boosts the
Attack stat after knocking out any Pokemon.

justified.name: Justified
justified.desc:
Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack
stat of the Pokemon, for justice.
justified.shortDesc:
Being hit by a Dark-type move boosts the Attack
stat of the Pokemon, for justice.

rattled.name: Rattled
rattled.desc:
Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the
Pokemon and boost its Speed stat.
rattled.shortDesc:
Dark-, Ghost-, and Bug-type moves scare the
Pokemon and boost its Speed stat.

magicbounce.name: Magic Bounce
magicbounce.desc:
Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit
by them.
magicbounce.shortDesc:
Reflects status moves, instead of getting hit
by them.

sapsipper.name: Sap Sipper
sapsipper.desc:
Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move,
instead of taking damage.
sapsipper.shortDesc:
Boosts the Attack stat if hit by a Grass-type move,
instead of taking damage.

prankster.name: Prankster
prankster.desc: Gives +1 priority to a status move.
prankster.shortDesc: Gives +1 priority to a status move.

sandforce.name: Sand Force
sandforce.desc:
Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type
moves in a sandstorm by 30%.
sandforce.shortDesc:
Boosts the power of Rock-, Ground-, and Steel-type
moves in a sandstorm by 30%.

ironbarbs.name: Iron Barbs
ironbarbs.desc:
Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with
iron barbs.
ironbarbs.shortDesc:
Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact with
iron barbs.

zenmode.name: Zen Mode
zenmode.desc:
Changes the Pokemon’s shape when HP is half
or less.
zenmode.shortDesc:
Changes the Pokemon’s shape when HP is half
or less.

luminescent.name: Luminescent
luminescent.desc:
Boosts accuracy by 10% for this side of the field.
Both this Pokemon and any allies are affected.
luminescent.shortDesc:
Boosts accuracy by 10% for this side of the field.
Both this Pokemon and any allies are affected.

turboblaze.name: Turboblaze
turboblaze.desc:
Moves can be used on the target regardless of
its Abilities.
turboblaze.shortDesc:
Moves can be used on the target regardless of
its Abilities.

teravolt.name: Teravolt
teravolt.desc:
Moves can be used on the target regardless of
its Abilities.
teravolt.shortDesc:
Moves can be used on the target regardless of
its Abilities.

aromaveil.name: Aroma Veil
aromaveil.desc:
Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit
their move choices.
aromaveil.shortDesc:
Protects itself and its allies from attacks that limit
their move choices.

flowerveil.name: Flower Veil
flowerveil.desc:
The user, and any other Grass-type allies
are immune to status conditions and
cannot have their stats lowered
flowerveil.shortDesc:
The user, and any other Grass-type allies
are immune to status conditions and
cannot have their stats lowered

metabolism.name: Metabolism
metabolism.desc: Restores 1/3 HP after eating ANY berry.
metabolism.shortDesc: Restores 1/3 HP after eating ANY berry.

versatility.name: Versatility
versatility.desc:
Changes the Pokemon’s type to the type of the
move it’s about to use.
versatility.shortDesc:
Changes the Pokemon’s type to the type of the
move it’s about to use.

furcoat.name: Fur Coat
furcoat.desc: Halves the damage from physical moves.
furcoat.shortDesc: Halves the damage from physical moves.

magician.name: Magician
magician.desc:
The Pokemon steals the held item of a Pokemon it
hits with a move.
magician.shortDesc:
The Pokemon steals the held item of a Pokemon it
hits with a move.

bulletproof.name: Bulletproof
bulletproof.desc:
Protects the Pokemon from some ball and
bomb moves. Full list on DoozDex.
bulletproof.shortDesc:
Protects the Pokemon from some ball and
bomb moves. Full list on DoozDex.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.desc:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat
is lowered.
competitive.shortDesc:
Boosts the Sp. Atk stat sharply when a stat
is lowered.

strongjaw.name: Strong Jaw
strongjaw.desc:
The Pokemon’s strong jaw boosts the power of its
biting moves by 50%.
strongjaw.shortDesc:
The Pokemon’s strong jaw boosts the power of its
biting moves by 50%.

refrigerate.name: Refrigerate
refrigerate.desc:
Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted by 20%.
refrigerate.shortDesc:
Normal-type moves become Ice-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted by 20%.

sweetveil.name: Sweet Veil
sweetveil.desc: Prevents itself and ally Pokemon from falling asleep.
sweetveil.shortDesc: Prevents itself and ally Pokemon from falling asleep.

stancechange.name: Stance Change
stancechange.desc:
The Pokemon changes its form to Blade Forme when
it uses an attack move, and changes to Shield Forme
when it uses King’s Shield.
stancechange.shortDesc:
The Pokemon changes its form to Blade Forme when
it uses an attack move, and changes to Shield Forme
when it uses King’s Shield.

galewings.name: Gale Wings
galewings.desc:
Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the 
Pokemon’s HP is full.
galewings.shortDesc:
Gives priority to Flying-type moves when the 
Pokemon’s HP is full.

megalauncher.name: Mega Launcher
megalauncher.desc: Powers up aura and pulse moves by 50%.
megalauncher.shortDesc: Powers up aura and pulse moves by 50%.

grassyguard.name: Grassy Guard
grassyguard.desc:
Boosts the Pokemon’s Defense stat in 
Grassy Terrain by 50%.
grassyguard.shortDesc:
Boosts the Pokemon’s Defense stat in 
Grassy Terrain by 50%.

symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
symbiosis.desc:
The Pokemon passes its item to an ally that has
used up an item.
symbiosis.shortDesc:
The Pokemon passes its item to an ally that has
used up an item.

toughclaws.name: Tough Claws
toughclaws.desc: Powers up moves that make direct contact.
toughclaws.shortDesc: Powers up moves that make direct contact.

pixilate.name: Pixilate
pixilate.desc:
Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.
pixilate.shortDesc:
Normal-type moves become Fairy-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.

gooey.name: Gooey
gooey.desc:
Contact with the Pokemon lowers the attacker’s
Speed stat.
gooey.shortDesc:
Contact with the Pokemon lowers the attacker’s
Speed stat.

aerilate.name: Aerilate
aerilate.desc:
Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.
aerilate.shortDesc:
Normal-type moves become Flying-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.

expertise.name: Expertise
expertise.desc:
Makes all moves hit twice. The second hit is
25% the power of the first.
expertise.shortDesc:
Makes all moves hit twice. The second hit is
25% the power of the first.

darkaura.name: Dark Aura
darkaura.desc:
Powers up each Pokemon’s Dark-type
moves by 33%. With STAB, this stacks to a 95% boost.
darkaura.shortDesc:
Powers up each Pokemon’s Dark-type
moves by 33%. With STAB, this stacks to a 95% boost.

fairyaura.name: Fairy Aura
fairyaura.desc:
Powers up each Pokemon’s Fairy-type
moves by 33%. With STAB, this stacks to a 95% boost.
fairyaura.shortDesc:
Powers up each Pokemon’s Fairy-type
moves by 33%. With STAB, this stacks to a 95% boost.

distortion.name: Distortion
distortion.desc:
The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed
to lower the power of affected moves by 25%.
distortion.shortDesc:
The effects of “Aura” Abilities are reversed
to lower the power of affected moves by 25%.

stormyseas.name: Stormy Seas
stormyseas.desc:
The Pokemon changes the weather to nullify
Fire-type attacks, and summon heavy rain.
stormyseas.shortDesc:
The Pokemon changes the weather to nullify
Fire-type attacks, and summon heavy rain.

swelteringsun.name: Sweltering Sun
swelteringsun.desc:
The Pokemon changes the weather to nullify
Water-type attacks, and summon intense sun.
swelteringsun.shortDesc:
The Pokemon changes the weather to nullify
Water-type attacks, and summon intense sun.

guardinggale.name: Guarding Gale
guardinggale.desc:
The Pokemon changes the weather to eliminate all
of the Flying type’s weaknesses.
guardinggale.shortDesc:
The Pokemon changes the weather to eliminate all
of the Flying type’s weaknesses.

stamina.name: Stamina
stamina.desc: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.
stamina.shortDesc: Boosts the Defense stat when hit by an attack.

wimpout.name: Wimp Out
wimpout.desc:
The Pokemon cowardly switches out when its HP
becomes half or less.
wimpout.shortDesc:
The Pokemon cowardly switches out when its HP
becomes half or less.

emergencyexit.name: Emergency Exit
emergencyexit.desc:
The Pokemon, sensing danger, switches out when its
HP becomes half or less.
emergencyexit.shortDesc:
The Pokemon, sensing danger, switches out when its
HP becomes half or less.

watercompaction.name: Water Compaction
watercompaction.desc:
Boosts the Pokemon’s Defense stat sharply when hit
by a Water-type move.
watercompaction.shortDesc:
Boosts the Pokemon’s Defense stat sharply when hit
by a Water-type move.

merciless.name: Merciless
merciless.desc:
The Pokemon’s attacks become critical hits if the
target is poisoned.
merciless.shortDesc:
The Pokemon’s attacks become critical hits if the
target is poisoned.

shieldsdown.name: Shields Down
shieldsdown.desc:
When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokemon’s
shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.
shieldsdown.shortDesc:
When its HP becomes half or less, the Pokemon’s
shell breaks and it becomes aggressive.

stakeout.name: Stakeout
stakeout.desc:
Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s
replacement if the target switches out.
stakeout.shortDesc:
Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s
replacement if the target switches out.

liquidveil.name: Liquid Veil
liquidveil.desc:
DOUBLES the power of Water moves, prevents burn
and halves damage taken from Fire moves.
liquidveil.shortDesc:
DOUBLES the power of Water moves, prevents burn
and halves damage taken from Fire moves.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.desc:
Boosts the Pokemon’s Sp. Atk stat each time its
HP drops below 50%.
berserk.shortDesc:
Boosts the Pokemon’s Sp. Atk stat each time its
HP drops below 50%.

slushrush.name: Slush Rush
slushrush.desc: Doubles the Pokemon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.
slushrush.shortDesc: Doubles the Pokemon’s Speed stat in a hailstorm.

longreach.name: Long Reach
longreach.desc:
The Pokemon uses its moves without making contact
with the target.
longreach.shortDesc:
The Pokemon uses its moves without making contact
with the target.

liquidvibration.name: Liquid Vibration
liquidvibration.desc: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
liquidvibration.shortDesc: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.

rapidfire.name: Rapid Fire
rapidfire.desc:
Moves that can hit 3 or more times gain +3 priority.
Explosion, Detonate some others do as well.
rapidfire.shortDesc:
Moves that can hit 3 or more times gain +3 priority.
Explosion, Detonate some others do as well.

galvanize.name: Galvanize
galvanize.desc:
Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.
galvanize.shortDesc:
Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves.
The power of those moves is boosted a little.

voltrush.name: Volt Rush
voltrush.desc:
Doubles the Pokemon’s Speed stat on
Electric Terrain.
voltrush.shortDesc:
Doubles the Pokemon’s Speed stat on
Electric Terrain.

schooling.name: Schooling
schooling.desc:
When it has a lot of HP, the Pokemon forms a
powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP
is low.
schooling.shortDesc:
When it has a lot of HP, the Pokemon forms a
powerful school. It stops schooling when its HP
is low.

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.desc:
Once per battle, the shroud that covers the
Pokemon can protect it from an attack.
disguise.shortDesc:
Once per battle, the shroud that covers the
Pokemon can protect it from an attack.

battlebond.name: Battle Bond
battlebond.desc:
Defeating an opposing Pokemon strengthens the
Pokemon’s bond with its Trainer, and it becomes
Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.
battlebond.shortDesc:
Defeating an opposing Pokemon strengthens the
Pokemon’s bond with its Trainer, and it becomes
Ash-Greninja. Water Shuriken gets more powerful.

powerconstruct.name: Power Construct
powerconstruct.desc:
Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes
half or less. Then the Pokemon changes
its form to Complete Forme.
powerconstruct.shortDesc:
Other Cells gather to aid when its HP becomes
half or less. Then the Pokemon changes
its form to Complete Forme.

corrosion.name: Corrosion
corrosion.desc:
The Pokemon can poison the target even if it’s
a Steel or Poison type.
corrosion.shortDesc:
The Pokemon can poison the target even if it’s
a Steel or Poison type.

comatose.name: Comatose
comatose.desc:
It’s always drowsing and will never wake up.
It can attack without waking up.
comatose.shortDesc:
It’s always drowsing and will never wake up.
It can attack without waking up.

queenlymajesty.name: Queenly Majesty
queenlymajesty.desc:
Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokemon,
making it unable to attack using priority moves.
queenlymajesty.shortDesc:
Its majesty pressures the opposing Pokemon,
making it unable to attack using priority moves.

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.desc:
Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit
by the amount equal to its last HP.
aftermath.shortDesc:
Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit
by the amount equal to its last HP.

envy.name: Envy
envy.desc:
When another Pokemon uses a setup move,
this copies the move immediately after.
envy.shortDesc:
When another Pokemon uses a setup move,
this copies the move immediately after.

battery.name: Battery
battery.desc: Powers up ally Pokemon’s special moves.
battery.shortDesc: Powers up ally Pokemon’s special moves.

fluffy.name: Fluffy
fluffy.desc:
Halves the damage taken from moves that make
direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.
fluffy.shortDesc:
Halves the damage taken from moves that make
direct contact, but doubles that of Fire-type moves.

dazzling.name: Dazzling
dazzling.desc:
Dazzles the opposing Pokemon, making it unable
to attack using priority moves.
dazzling.shortDesc:
Dazzles the opposing Pokemon, making it unable
to attack using priority moves.

hubris.name: Hubris
hubris.desc: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokemon faints.
hubris.shortDesc: Boosts its Sp. Atk stat every time a Pokemon faints.

tanglinghair.name: Tangling Hair
tanglinghair.desc:
Contact with the Pokemon lowers the attacker’s
Speed stat.
tanglinghair.shortDesc:
Contact with the Pokemon lowers the attacker’s
Speed stat.

receiver.name: Receiver
receiver.desc: The Pokemon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
receiver.shortDesc: The Pokemon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

powerofalchemy.name: Power of Alchemy
powerofalchemy.desc: The Pokemon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
powerofalchemy.shortDesc: The Pokemon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.

proficiency.name: Proficiency
proficiency.desc:
The Pokemon boosts its most proficient stat each
time it knocks out a Pokemon.
proficiency.shortDesc:
The Pokemon boosts its most proficient stat each
time it knocks out a Pokemon.

rkssystem.name: RKS System
rkssystem.desc:
Changes the Pokemon’s type to match the
memory disc it holds.
rkssystem.shortDesc:
Changes the Pokemon’s type to match the
memory disc it holds.

electricsurge.name: Electric Surge
electricsurge.desc:
Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the
Pokemon enters a battle.
electricsurge.shortDesc:
Turns the ground into Electric Terrain when the
Pokemon enters a battle.

psychicsurge.name: Psychic Surge
psychicsurge.desc:
Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when
the Pokemon enters a battle.
psychicsurge.shortDesc:
Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when
the Pokemon enters a battle.

mistysurge.name: Misty Surge
mistysurge.desc:
Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when
the Pokemon enters a battle.
mistysurge.shortDesc:
Turns the ground into Misty Terrain when
the Pokemon enters a battle.

grassysurge.name: Grassy Surge
grassysurge.desc:
Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when
the Pokemon enters a battle.
grassysurge.shortDesc:
Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when
the Pokemon enters a battle.

birdseyeview.name: Bird's Eye View
birdseyeview.desc:
Prevents other Pokemon’s moves or Abilities from
lowering the Pokemon’s stats.
birdseyeview.shortDesc:
Prevents other Pokemon’s moves or Abilities from
lowering the Pokemon’s stats.

energyshield.name: Energy Shield
energyshield.desc:
Halves the amount of damage the Pokemon takes
while its HP is full.
energyshield.shortDesc:
Halves the amount of damage the Pokemon takes
while its HP is full.

resilient.name: Resilient
resilient.desc: Reduces super effective damage taken by 25%.
resilient.shortDesc: Reduces super effective damage taken by 25%.

neuroforce.name: Neuroforce
neuroforce.desc: Boosts it's super effective moves by 25%.
neuroforce.shortDesc: Boosts it's super effective moves by 25%.
